UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS
February 16 1955
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
I read an article in Feb. Cosmopolitan ” Violence on TV - Entertainment
or Menace? M They mention a report by Professor Dallas W. Smythe.
I would like to purchase a copy of this report.
Please let me know.
Sincerly,
if it is available.
G.Norman Palser/m
I am asking Hearst Corp. to re-address this letter to you
